attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I feel that the constant re offenders of drink driving and dangerous drivers who only get afew months ban on their licences and small fines especially those that have caused deaths by theses offences should have their licences taken away for good and they should receive prison sentences not fines.

rejection.details:
There is a similar petition at:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/drinkdriveamd/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
